game.name: Eight Mini Racers
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: 1 - 8 player local multiplayer 2D top-down racing game. Racing, rockets, mines, steering failure, engine failure, repair kits, speed boosts and up to 8 players.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 1 - 8 player local multiplayer 2D top-down racing game. Racing, rockets, mines, steering failure, engine failure, repair kits, speed boosts and up to 8 players.
